snippet: Why is the Trans-Pacific Partnership being kept under wraps?
abstract: Op-Ed article by trade experts Lori Wallach and Ben Beachy questions why Obama administration has been keeping secret the details of Trans-Pacific Partnership, most significant international commercial agreement since creation of World Trade Organization; holds secrecy of partnership process represents assault on principles and practice of democratic governance.

byline.original: By LORI WALLACH and BEN BEACHY

lead_paragraph: Why is the Trans-Pacific Partnership being kept under wraps?
